title: Dengue detection smartphone tech shows new hope for low-cost diagnostics: New research paper shows clinical sensitivity on par with lab-based testing - Science Daily
content: Dengue detection smartphone tech shows new hope for low-cost diagnostics: New research paper shows clinical sensitivity on par with lab-based testing  Science Daily
description: Accurate home testing could be used for a wider range of illnesses, as new research shows the capability of smartphone-powered tests for Dengue Fever.
